REFERENCE.TITLE: Piano Rolls and Contemporary Player Pianos
REFERENCE.SUBTITLE: The Catalogues, Technologies, Archiving and Accessibility
REFERENCE.AUTHOR: Phillips, P{eter}

REFERENCE.TITLE: List of Artists Recorded Rolls for the Welte-Mignon Autograph Piano
REFERENCE.ANNOTATION:
Piano-roll catalog of the Welte-Mignon Corporation up to 1910.
		The first roll is 2 and the last is 3947.  Original prices are
		given.  Sections: pianists, opera and operetta, hymns and songs, 
		light convert music, accompaniments, composers, numerical list.

REFERENCE.TITLE: Condon Collection Master Inventory 20150122
